history.proof: intros. unfold RElim in *. intros. qsimpl time: 5 use: arrow_relim.

exceptions.tactic: apply (arrow_relim _ _ f g v1 v2 P Q).
exceptions.exn: In environment V1 : Type V2 : Type E : rel V1 V2 FV1 : V1 -> Type FV2 : V2 -> Type R : forall (x : V1) (x0 : V2), rel (FV1 x) (FV2 x0) f : forall x : V1, FV1 x g : forall x : V2, FV2 x v1 : V1 v2 : V2 P, Q : Prop H : R v1 v2 (f v1) (g v2) -> P -> Q H0 : (forallr v1 v2 : E, R v1 v2)%rel f g H1 : E v1 v2 /\\ P The term "f" has type "forall x : V1, FV1 x" while it is expected to have type "V1 -> ?B1" (cannot instantiate "?B1" because "x" is not in its scope: available arguments are "V1" "V2" "E" "FV1" "FV2" "R" "f" "g" "v1" "v2" "P" "Q" "H" "H0" "H1").

original: intros. unfold RElim in *. intros. apply (arrow_relim _ _ f g v1 v2 P Q). apply H.
